mapper.select: SELECT b.book_isbn, b.book_title, a.author_name, p.publisher_name, bc.category_name, CONCAT('/files/', up.file_name) AS coverUrl, SUM(cod.amount) AS totalSales FROM customer_order_details cod JOIN customer_orders co ON cod.customer_order_id = co.customer_order_id JOIN books b ON cod.book_isbn = b.book_isbn JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id JOIN publishers p ON b.publisher_id = p.publisher_id JOIN book_categories bc ON b.category_id = bc.category_id LEFT JOIN upload_files up ON b.cover_image_id = up.upload_file_id LEFT JOIN refund_orders r ON r.customer_order_id = co.customer_order_id WHERE r.customer_order_id IS NULL GROUP BY b.book_isbn, b.book_title, a.author_name, p.publisher_name, bc.category_name, coverUrl ORDER BY totalSales DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT b.book_isbn, b.book_title, a.author_name, p.publisher_name, bc.category_name, CONCAT('/files/', up.file_name) AS coverUrl, SUM(cod.amount) AS totalSales FROM customer_order_details cod JOIN customer_orders co ON cod.customer_order_id = co.customer_order_id JOIN books b ON cod.book_isbn = b.book_isbn JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id JOIN publishers p ON b.publisher_id = p.publisher_id JOIN book_categories bc ON b.category_id = bc.category_id LEFT JOIN upload_files up ON b.cover_image_id = up.upload_file_id LEFT JOIN refund_orders r ON r.customer_order_id = co.customer_order_id WHERE co.ordered_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND (bc.category_id = #{categoryId} OR bc.parent_category_id = #{categoryId}) AND r.customer_order_id IS NULL GROUP BY b.book_isbn, b.book_title, a.author_name, p.publisher_name, bc.category_name, up.file_name ORDER BY totalSales DESC LIMIT 20;
